title: VP of Technology
content:
Build A Rocket Boy is a leading video game company developing innovative and immersive gaming experiences.
We are dedicated to pushing the boundaries of technology and delivering exceptional gaming products to players worldwide.
The role:
We are seeking a dynamic and experienced VP of Technology to lead our technical team and drive the company's technological strategy.
Reporting into the Glen Pryer as the VP of Technology, you will play a crucial role in shaping the company's technological vision, implementing cutting-edge solutions and new technology initiatives as well as overseeing the development process of our video games.
Key Responsibilities:

Fostering a single source of technology vision and direction. Setting and executing the overall technology strategy in alignment with our company goals. Identifying opportunities for innovation and optimization, drive the implementation of new technologies and tools, and establish best practices and standards to enhance game development efficiency and quality.
Leading and retaining a high-performing team of 100+ talented engineers, designers, and technical professionals, fostering a culture of innovation and collaboration, ensuring that your team is structured with the right roles, processes and individuals to drive success.
Managing the creation and maintenance of a detailed technical roadmap allowing all stakeholders to understand the plans for the technology teams and the ongoing progress to towards key goals and objectives.
Driving the research and development efforts to explore emerging technologies and trends in the gaming industry, identifying opportunities for innovation and improvement.
Collaborating closely with cross-functional teams including game designers, artists, and producers to ensure seamless integration of technology and gameplay elements.
Overseeing the entire game development process and workflow architecture from concept to launch, ensuring technical feasibility, scalability, and adherence to project timelines.
Being a key part of studio leadership upholding a high standard of teamwork and clear communication throughout the Engineering staff as well as the studio.
Establishing and maintaining a robust and scalable infrastructure to support online gaming operations, including server architecture, network infrastructure, and data management systems.
Creating partnerships with external technology vendors and industry leaders to leverage expertise, tools, and resources.
Monitoring and evaluating performance metrics, providing regular reports to executive management, and making data-driven recommendations for continuous improvement.
Defining and managing the technology department's budget, ensuring optimal utilisation of resources and cost-effective decision-making. Identifying staffing needs, recruit top talent, and managing external vendor relationships too.
Staying up-to-date with industry advancements, competitive landscape, and best practices in game development technology. Identifying opportunities for product differentiation and competitive advantage.

 
This role will be a great fit if:

You bring a proven track record in a senior technical leadership role within the gaming industry.
You have extensive experience in managing and leading cross-functional technical teams.
You bring a strong knowledge of game development principles, technologies, platforms, engines, and tools.
You have strong knowledge of software engineering principles, including software design patterns, object-oriented programming, modular architecture, and version control systems (e.g., Git).
You have experience in working with agile development methodologies and continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines.
Youâ€™re familiar with emerging technologies such as AIGC and cloud gaming.
You have solid knowledge of network protocols (TCP/IP, UDP), server-client architectures, multiplayer networking concepts, and security protocols. Understanding load balancing, latency optimization, and experience with cloud platforms (e.g., GCS,AWS, Azure) is important.
Youâ€™re a strategic thinker and problem-solver, with the ability to translate business requirements into technical solutions.
Youâ€™re an exceptional communicator, and can effectively collaborate with stakeholders at all levels of an organisation.
Developing into a CTO role is the next step on your career journey, this is the most senior technology role within BARB so the sky is the limit here.

If youâ€™re based in the UK

About us
Build A Rocket Boy is developing EVERYWHERE; an experience with a breadth of unimaginable gameplay adventure.
We are a mix of industry leading veterans whose credits include some of the best selling and most loved games of all time. Weâ€™re a creative digital entertainment studio with an open and progressive methodology, dedicated to delivering games of the highest calibre possible.
If you want to feel comfortable, inspired, and appreciated in your work pursuits then come join us. We have offices in Edinburgh, Budapest and consider WFH candidates.
